3: ...Don't stop! Watanabe!
Ugh... this stench of blood...
The floor... it's all...
It's the recon team sent here by HQ before...
Their trails end here...
They all... died...
Are you okay, Watanabe?
I still can't... in an actual battlefield—I lied.
Don't mourn the dead with sorrow, Watanabe.
Let them become your power to carry on.
...Let's go back.
Regrouping team. Stationing here. Oasis team 2, split and prepare to head out.
Where are you bringing them, Bruce?
The map shows a church in the snowfields up ahead north, there might be people left in there...
...The recon team's only gotten as far as this place. If we go any further—
What greets you will be a church full of mechanoid monsters, as for any citizens left... There will only be machines.
No matter how hopeless, as long as I can save someone...
You're just going on a suicide mission!
Watanabe, stay with the main team, and station here as well!
Bruce!!
This is an order! I hold the right to command for team Oasis!
I'll be back here in an hour...
As a soldier, we must ensure the civilians' safety before our own and save as many lives as possible.
If there really are survivors in the church waiting for help... and we're here as well, then we cannot turn a blind eye.
...It'll be fine, Watanabe.
